paper_title: Transverse minimal foliations on unit tangent bundles and applications
abstract: We show that if $\mathcal{F}_1$ and $\mathcal{F}_2$ are two transverse minimal foliations on $M = T^1S$ then either they intersect in an Anosov foliation or there exists a Reeb-surface in the intersection foliation. The existence of a Reeb surface is incompatible with partially hyperbolic foliations so we deduce from this that certain partially hyperbolic diffeomorphisms in unit tangent bundles are collapsed Anosov flows. We also conclude that every volume preserving partially hyperbolic diffeomorphism of a unit tangent bundle is ergodic.
